pages.text: While naturally ill-equipped for defending others, with a little bit of help their resilient nature allows them to become staunch guardians.$(br2)The $(bold)Guard$() command causes your Pet Rock™ to take on a defensive stance, becoming nearly impervious to damage.$(br2)Simply holding your Pet Rock™ in your offhand is enough to
impart some of that defense to you.$(br2)Positioning the rock between yourself and any potential damage sources can negate all but the most powerful of blows.
